name: Boots of Dynamism
passive: The “Strike” passive increases your armor penetration, helping you deal more damage to tanky targets. Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and assassins who want to close gaps faster and land more powerful auto-attacks.
active: S to attack damage and movement speed, while the “Strike” passive increases your armor penetration, helping you deal more damage to tanky targets. Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and assassins who want to close gaps faster and land more powerful auto-attacks.
tips: Boots of DynamismAttack Damage, Armor Penetration +30 Attack Damage +45 Move Speed.Strike:  +10 Armor Penetration.

1400


These boots are perfect for champions who rely on physical damage and need extra mobility to roam the map quickly.
They grant bonuses to attack damage and movement speed, while the “Strike” passive increases your armor penetration, helping you deal more damage to tanky targets.
Especially useful for marksmen, fighters, and assassins who want to close gaps faster and land more powerful auto-attacks.
